toANSYS

public java.lang.String toANSYS()
Export a volumic sphere in ANSYS. In ANSYS, you have to move the working plane, create a sphere of wanted radius, and reset the workig plane. SPH4 command is used. SPH5 of SPHERE might also be used.

Overrides:
toANSYS in class Obj
See Also:
anar.geo.Obj#toANSYS()
